Title: Lord Baltimore (No. 104)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jon Bokenkamp, John Eisendrath, Amanda Kate Shuman (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: Red continues to battle Berlin and faces a new threat from a man named Lord Baltimore. An important person comes back from the past into Red's world. Meanwhile, Liz tries to move forward with her life after her showdown with Tom.
